properties.name: app.youtube.enabled
properties.description: if enabled, the YouTube API is used to fetch the list of streams. If disabled, a dummy implementation is used.

properties.name: app.youtube.refresh_token
properties.description: OAuth 2.0 refresh token from the Google API. Retrieve one via /setup.

properties.name: app.youtube.client_id
properties.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID from the Google API.

properties.name: app.youtube.client_secret
properties.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret from the Google API.
